byline: Kai Ryssdal, Tim Fitzsimons, Steve Gardner, Gina Delvac and Jeff Tyler
teaser: Airing on Thursday, April 2, 2015: Speaking at an economic conference in Washington, Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen again hit on the idea that income inequality is a problem. In fact, she called it a "disturbing trend." The central bank’s mandate is clear: promoting full employment and keeping inflation in check. What can (and should) Yellen be doing about income inequality. We explore.

title: Marketplace for Thursday, April 2, 2015
